Traits.Name: Ferocity
Traits.Description: On the first round of combat, beasts double their speed.

Traits.Name: Flank
Traits.Description: While two or more beasts are adjacent to a character hostile to them, that character takes +2 damage from their attacks.

Traits.Name: Feral
Traits.Description: Always have hatred of the character that damaged them last, or the closest character (can choose either).

SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Beasts do not flee or negotiate.
